front.title: Security Technical Specification for Smart Devices of IoT

abstract.t: As IoT adoption accelerates, securing smart devices emerges as a critical priority. This proposal outlines a comprehensive security framework spanning hardware integrity, system reliability, data protection, network safeguards, and management controls. The framework mandates secure hardware interfaces, firmware validation mechanisms, robust data encryption protocols, encrypted communication channels, and systematic security auditing processes to ensure end- to-end protection across device ecosystems.
